terms.definition: The art and science of crafting effective inputs for AI language models to generate desired outputs.
A type of AI model trained on vast text data to understand and generate human-like language.
Written content that explains how to use, maintain, or develop a product, system, or service.
A centralized repository of information that provides answers to common questions and solutions to problems.
An AI chatbot developed by OpenAI that generates human-like text responses based on prompts.
A documentation platform that helps create, edit, manage, and share documents with collaborative features and AI integration.
Computer systems designed to perform tasks that typically require human intelligence.
The process of creating, sharing, using, and managing organizational information and knowledge.
A fictional representation of an ideal user based on demographic data and user behavior patterns.
An advanced large language model developed by OpenAI, successor to the models powering ChatGPT.
A branch of AI focused on enabling computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language.
A professional who creates documentation that helps people understand and use products or services.
The process and systems used to create, review, approve, and publish technical content.
An Indian non-governmental trade association and advocacy group focused on the technology industry.
terms.expanded: National Association of Software and Service Companies

terms.definition: A subset of AI that enables systems to learn and improve from experience without explicit programming.
